description:
The component renders a `<th>` element when the parent context is a header
or otherwise a `<td>` element.
propAlign:
Set the text-align on the table cell content.

Monetary or generally number fields **should be right aligned** as that allows
you to add them up quickly in your head without having to worry about decimals.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propComponent:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propPadding:
Sets the padding applied to the cell.
The prop defaults to the value (`'default'`) inherited from the parent Table component.
propSize:
Specify the size of the cell.
The prop defaults to the value (`'medium'`) inherited from the parent Table component.
propVariant:
Specify the cell type.
The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent TableHead, TableBody, or TableFooter components.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesHead: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="head"` or `context.table.head`.
stylesBody: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="body"` or `context.table.body`.
stylesFooter: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="footer"` or `context.table.footer`.
stylesSizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `size="small"`.
stylesPaddingCheckbox: Styles applied to the root element if `padding="checkbox"`.
stylesPaddingNone: Styles applied to the root element if `padding="none"`.
stylesAlignLeft: Styles applied to the root element if `align="left"`.
stylesAlignCenter: Styles applied to the root element if `align="center"`.
stylesAlignRight: Styles applied to the root element if `align="right"`.
stylesAlignJustify: Styles applied to the root element if `align="justify"`.
stylesStickyHeader: Styles applied to the root element if `context.table.stickyHeader={true}`.
